uat_scenario_details.user_story: As a finance user, I want to create a balanced journal entry
uat_scenario_details.message:
Journal entry creation failed: (psycopg2.errors.ForeignKeyViolation) insert or update on table "journalentryline" violates foreign key constraint "journalentryline_glaccountid_fkey"
DETAIL:  Key (glaccountid)=(230001) is not present in table "glaccount".

[SQL: 
                        INSERT INTO journalentryline (
                            documentnumber, companycodeid, linenumber, glaccountid,
                            debitamount, creditamount, description
                        ) VALUES (
                            %(doc_number)s, %(company_code)s, %(line_number)s, %(account)s,
                            %(debit_amount)s, %(credit_amount)s, %(description)s
                        )
                    ]
[parameters: {'doc_number': 'UAT20250806095543', 'company_code': '1000', 'line_number': 3, 'account': '230001', 'debit_amount': 0.0, 'credit_amount': 600.0, 'description': 'Sales tax payable'}]
(Background on this error at: https://sqlalche.me/e/20/gkpj)

uat_scenario_details.user_story: As a controller, I want to generate IFRS-compliant trial balance reports
uat_scenario_details.message:
Report generation failed (known schema issue): (psycopg2.errors.UndefinedColumn) column ag.account_group_code does not exist
LINE 19: ...JOIN account_groups ag ON ga.account_group_code = ag.account...
                                                              ^
HINT:  Perhaps you meant to reference the column "ga.account_group_code".

[SQL: 
                    SELECT 
                        ga.glaccountid,
                        ga.accountname,
                        ga.accounttype,
                        ag.account_group_name,
                        ag.account_type as account_classification,
                        COALESCE(SUM(gab.ytd_debits), 0) as total_debits,
                        COALESCE(SUM(gab.ytd_credits), 0) as total_credits,
                        COALESCE(SUM(gab.ytd_balance), 0) as net_balance,
                        ga.currencycode as account_currency,
                        COUNT(DISTINCT gab.posting_period) as periods_with_activity
                    FROM glaccount ga
                    LEFT JOIN gl_account_balances gab ON ga.glaccountid = gab.gl_account
                        AND gab.company_code = %(company_code)s
                        AND gab.ledger_id = %(ledger_id)s
                        AND gab.fiscal_year = %(fiscal_year)s
                        
                    LEFT JOIN account_groups ag ON ga.account_group_code = ag.account_group_code
                    WHERE ga.companycodeid = %(company_code)s
                    GROUP BY ga.glaccountid, ga.accountname, ga.accounttype, 
                             ag.account_group_name, ag.account_type, ga.currencycode
                    HAVING COALESCE(SUM(gab.ytd_debits), 0) != 0 
                        OR COALESCE(SUM(gab.ytd_credits), 0) != 0
                    ORDER BY ga.glaccountid
                ]
[parameters: {'company_code': '1000', 'ledger_id': '2L', 'fiscal_year': 2025}]
(Background on this error at: https://sqlalche.me/e/20/f405)

details.known_issue: Account group column reference issue identified in E2E testing
